title: Enterprise Sales - Middle East
content:
How You'll Find Success:

Transparency, Integrity and Quality are at the forefront of your approach to sales
Your focus is acquiring new business, and selling the Qualtrics Platform to varying clients 
Developing account plans for a set list of target accounts, from power maps to demand generation to closing plans
You will establish, handle, and manage relationships between Qualtrics and senior executives of both client and prospect companies
Strategising internally with SDRs (sales development representatives), solutions consultants, partners etc on how we will create demand in the account & drive senior engagement 
Understanding prospects & customers business issues and what industry challenges they face
Craft business cases that will demonstrate to clients the business value & return they will see by using Qualtrics
Maintaining a real-time understanding of Qualtrics' solution offerings and the competitive landscape to assist in figuring out win-based proposals and pricing

 
What We're Looking For On Your CV:

Significant experience selling SaaS solutions to C level executives and experience in discussing strategic business issues at Director and C level
Strong track record in achieving and exceeding sales quotas 
Fluency in English (Fluency in Arabic a bonus)
You are passionate about educating potential clients on solutions that are applicable to their situation and helping them understand how the software can drive a return on investment for them
You can leverage your network in the UAE to generate interest in Qualtrics solutions
You engage with clients at all points of the sales cycle - from prospecting and acquiring clients, through demoing the Qualtrics product, to negotiating and closing, and beyond.
You have the agility to adapt, pivot and change your approach based on the needs of your business
You bring together internal resources that enable you to be successful sales professional

 
Our Teamâ€™s Favourite Perks and Benefits:

We use our own software to capture Employee Engagement & Manager Effectiveness and our Leadership team is committed to always improving
Our employees are the owner of their success and will run their own business where achievement is rewarded
Work life integration is deeply important to us - we have frequent office events, team outings and happy hours
We take pride in our offices design aiming at fostering creativity, from our rooftop views to an open and collaborative work space.
Learning and personal development: we have a dedicated team focused on enabling our teams
To learn more about what we value read about it directly from our employees Qualtrics Life stories

demographic_questions.description:
We invite you to participate in the following voluntary demographic question. The data collected will be used anonymously and in aggregate, so we can evaluate our processes to ensure we're providing equal opportunities to applicants from all backgrounds. Your responses, or your choice not to respond, will not be associated with your specific application and will not in any way be used for individual hiring or compensation decisions.

The following questions are optional. If you would prefer not to answer, you can skip to the next set of questions, or select "Prefer not to say". Any personal data collected using this survey, including any special categories of personal data, shall be processed in accordance with the Qualtrics Candidate Privacy Statement, available at https://www.qualtrics.com/candidate-privacy-statement/.

questions.description: This question links the Greenhouse Job ID to the Phenom Job Board. It should not be visible to external candidates. Please don't delete.
questions.label: Internal purposes only - no need to answer
Are you of legal age to work in the country in which this position is based?
Are you legally authorized to work in the country in which this position is located?
Are you willing to undergo a background check as part of this hiring process?
Have you ever worked at Qualtrics in the following capacities? (check all that apply):

values.label: I have not worked for Qualtrics in the past

questions.label: Do you now or will you in the future require Qualtrics to sponsor your employment in the country in which this position is located?

Are you related to a current employee of Qualtrics? If yes, please specify name and relationship. A "relative" is defined as one of the following: spouse or significant other, parent/step parent, child/step child, grandparent, grandchild, brother, sister, uncle, aunt, nephew, niece, first cousin, in-laws (mother, father, sister, brother, daughter, son).
Where have you seen Qualtrics prior to applying? Select all that apply.

values.label: I am a member of the Qualtrics Talent Community
I learned about Qualtrics from a current employee (social networking, referral, word of mouth)
I attended a networking event or career fair
I have seen Qualtrics on social media (LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, etc)
I found Qualtrics through a third-party career site (Indeed, Glassdoor, University website, niche networking site, etc)
I have read content created by Qualtrics
I have used the Qualtrics product suite
I googled jobs and a Qualtrics role was suggested
I am a current Qualtrics employee
